system.description:
When you select this archetype at 2nd level, you learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.9ot2c39ypiu4l8ws]{Ray of Frost} cantrip if you do not know it already.

In addition, all cold spells count as witch spells for you and whenever you cast a cold spell of 1st level or higher, it counts as being one spell slot higher than you actually expended, to a maximum of the highest level spell slot you posess. In the case of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.lnbcwy44k19g4bbu]{Fire Shield} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.p7fi3wqgh7kk93ka]{Infernal Weapon} this benefit only applies when casting the cold version.
